bioconda.name: bioconductor-organismdbi
bioconda.summary: Software to enable the smooth interfacing of different database packages

biotools.summary: The package enables a simple unified interface to several annotation packages each of which has its own schema by taking advantage of the fact that each of these packages implements a select methods.

bioschemas.name: OrganismDbi
bioschemas.summary: The package enables a simple unified interface to several annotation packages each of which has its own schema by taking advantage of the fact that each of these packages implements a select methods.
